Description:
Procure or agree the services of contractors and/or subcontractors who work on the construction of the project.
Collaborate with suitable vendors and contractors for smooth advancement of a project.
Implement the best practices to approach and finish a construction project as per the set economic plan.
Form fruitful connections with technical and non-technical staff
steel industry experience is necessary.Skills
Skills:
Attention to detail and a methodical approach to work.
Skilled in using digital tools and apps to simplify the quantity surveying process.
Good command of interpersonal skills to extract the best output from different professionals working on a project.
Hands-on expertise in various software in surveying activity.
Should have minimum 5 years of experience
Indian/Pakistani candidates are preferred.
Interested candidates can share the resume
